cards.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
cards.title: Mindfulness
cards.name: Buddha

cards.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
cards.title: Resilience
cards.name: Nelson Mandela

cards.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma â€“ which is living with the results of other people's thinking.
cards.title: Life
cards.name: Steve Jobs

cards.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
cards.title: Wisdom
cards.name: Robert Frost

cards.quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
cards.title: Choice
cards.name: J.K. Rowling
